department.dept_long_name: Department of Stem Cell and Regenerative Biology

course.title: Human Disease
course.description: This course will address both the molecular basis of human disease, and the biological and chemical foundation of therapeutic intervention. The course will include lectures by prominent experts, and analysis of the primary literature.
course.prerequisites: Chemistry 20/30 or 17/27, Life Sciences 52 or their equivalents.
course.notes: May not be taken concurrently with MCB 185. May not be taken for credit if MCB 185 or Chemistry 285 has already been taken. Credit cannot also be received for MCB 185.
